# Network updates

**Article**

Learn about important changes to Network.

## Overview

Browse notable changes in [https://developer.apple.com/documentation/network].

## June 2024

- Add the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/BundleResources/Information-Property-List/NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription] key to your app’s information property list to get permission to connect to services on the local network, including Bonjour services. For the key’s value, provide a string that explains why your app uses local network services.
